page.title: 07COMMUNITY INDUSTRIES
page.content: Community Industries An organisation employing for two years,for a nominal wage,young school leavers who have under_achieved and gained no qualifications in school. 22 staff and 150 young employees.Site _ old fire station.Wages paid by Goverment, local council responsible for upkeep of premises. New skills learned but no qualifications gained. Work-furniture repairs,sewing,small building work, decorating, comunity work generally but no private work for individuals.Success rate in finding work after leaving organisation poor-8o% success in 1972,2o% success in 1985.Aim of the organisation is to make better people.
